index.name: famous
index.subtitle: Famo.us
index.about: Famo.us is the only JavaScript framework that includes an open source 3D layout engine fully integrated with a 3D physics animation engine that can render to DOM, Canvas, or WebGL.
index.description: Watch screencasts over a list with the best free videos about Famo.us framework.

videos.title: Famo.us
videos.description: In this episode, Dave Fetterman explains what Famo.us is and how it can be used to build beautiful and performant applications with their framework.

videos.title: Meteor + Famo.us: Made for each other
videos.description: An introduction video which explores how to integrate Famo.us with Meteor frameworks
